ygData.subject: RE: Disenchant and Antimagic Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes.  I ve tried targeting myself, targeting a party member, targeting the mob who cast the spell, having it playing when the effect is cast, with both
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 17 Sep 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> Has anyone tried playing the 22d level song while under the influence of a
> negative spell, with a lute equipped, and themselves targetted (by hitting
> the F1 key or left-clicking on their name). The times I have tried to use

Yes. I've tried targeting myself, targeting a party member,
targeting the mob who cast the spell, having it playing when
the effect is cast, with both positive and negative spell
effects. Nothing. Given that the level 40 song was broken
until we complained about it, I do believe that there's the
slight chance that it's within the realm of possibility that
the level 22 song is also broken.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
